      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection
      branchName - the branch whom restaurants are needed
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the list of suppliers and response status

      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateOrderStatusTime

      public void updateOrderStatusTime(Connection dbConn, Order order) throws SQLException
      Updates the status and arrival time of the specified order. IF THE ORDER IS LATE WE UPDATE THE WALLED BY 50% OF TOTAL PRICE!
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection
      order - the order to be updated
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateOrderAndItems

      public ServerResponseDataContainer updateOrderAndItems(Connection dbConn, Order order, Map<ItemInOrder,Integer> receivedCart) throws SQLException
      Updates the database with a new order and associated items.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection to use for the transaction
      order - the order to be inserted into the database
      receivedCart - a map of ItemInOrder objects and their quantities to be inserted into the `items_in_orders` table
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing either the new order ID or an error message
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error accessing the database, executing the query, or handling the transaction

    • updateCustomerWalletBalance

      public void updateCustomerWalletBalance(Connection dbConn, Order order, float amount) throws SQLException
      Updates the wallet balance of customers who participated in a given order (LATE ORDER).
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the query and update operations.
      order - The `Order` object containing the `OrderID` used to identify the relevant order.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs during the execution of the queries. This includes errors related to the database connection, query syntax, or data manipulation.

    • isLateByTimeDiffAndStatus

      private boolean isLateByTimeDiffAndStatus(OrderType type, String requestedOrApprovalTime, String requestedOrApprovalDateStr)
      Determines if an order is late based on the type of order and the time difference between the current time and the requested or approval time.
      Parameters:
      type - the OrderType of the order (e.g., REGULAR or PRE_ORDER)
      requestedOrApprovalTime - the time of the request or approval in "HH:mm:ss" format
      requestedOrApprovalDateStr - the date of the request or approval in "yyyy-MM-dd" format
      Returns:
      true if the order is late based on the type and time difference, false otherwise
